name: part_005
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】ReGLOSS 1st Live ＂Flashpoint＂【有明アリーナ】 [wlPLYUOmtHE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section: ReGLOSS members give safety instructions and venue rules to the audience before the show starts.

subtitles.original: はい！ReGLOSSです！
subtitles.english: Hi! We are ReGLOSS!

subtitles.original: 最後までライブを楽しんでいただくために、いくつかご案内させていただきます。
subtitles.english: To ensure everyone enjoys the live show until the end, we have a few announcements.

subtitles.original: 公演中の撮影、録音、録画機材の使用は固くお断りいたします。
subtitles.english: Photography, recording, and the use of recording equipment during the performance are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: 万が一、具合が悪くなってしまった場合は、無理をせず、近くのスタッフへお知らせください。
subtitles.english: If you happen to feel unwell, please don't overdo it and let a nearby staff member know.

subtitles.original: 会場内でのモッシュ、ダイブ、大きく飛び跳ねる、ステージにもの...な...
subtitles.english: Mosh pits, diving, jumping excessively, throwing things at the stage... n-...

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、大丈夫！
subtitles.english: It's okay, it's okay!

subtitles.original: すみませんね、あの収録とかじゃないんで。
subtitles.english: Sorry, it's not like this is a recording or anything.

subtitles.original: 緊張してるね。
subtitles.english: You're nervous, aren't you?

subtitles.original: 緊張しちゃいました、ごめんなさい。もう一回行きます。ごめんなさい。
subtitles.english: I got nervous, I'm sorry. I'll go again. Sorry.

subtitles.original: 会場内でのモッシュ、ダイブ、大きく飛び跳ねる、ステージにものを投げ込むなど、他のみんなの迷惑になったり公演を妨げる行為は一切禁止です。ルールを守って盛り上がってくださいね！
subtitles.english: Mosh pits, diving, jumping excessively, and throwing things onto the stage are all strictly prohibited as they bother others and disrupt the show. Please follow the rules and have a blast!

subtitles.original: また、本公演は映像配信および写真撮影用のカメラが会場内に入り、客席が映り込む場合がございます。
subtitles.english: Also, cameras for video streaming and photography are in the venue, so the audience may be captured on film.

subtitles.original: 映像や写真はプロモーションなどに使用される可能性がございますので、あらかじめご了承ください。
subtitles.english: Please be aware that the footage and photos may be used for promotions and other purposes.

subtitles.original: ライブのハッシュタグは #リグロス1stライブ です。
subtitles.english: The hashtag for the live is #ReGLOSSFirstLive.

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグを使ってたくさん盛り上げて下さい！
subtitles.english: Please use the hashtag and get everyone hyped!

subtitles.original: それでは開演までもう少々！
subtitles.english: Well then, just a little longer until the show starts!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がる準備はできてますかー？！
subtitles.english: Are you ready to get hyped?!

subtitles.original: みんなで一緒に盛り上がるぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's all get hyped together!

subtitles.original: 以上、ReGLOSSでした！
subtitles.english: That's all from ReGLOSS!

subtitles.original: Don't you get away... wake up people
subtitles.english: Don't you get away... wake up people

subtitles.original: I don't care... wake up people
subtitles.english: I don't care... wake up people

subtitles.original: どんな視線も釘付け Pretty Girl. OK.
subtitles.english: Every gaze is fixed on us, Pretty Girl. OK.

subtitles.original: 一人じゃ足りないこの声より The Self
subtitles.english: More than just this one voice, the self

subtitles.original: いた高みの私 Command G
subtitles.english: The me at the peak... Command G

subtitles.original: 今そばにいるけれど妙に
subtitles.english: I'm right here beside you, but oddly

subtitles.original: 面白いフラグが
subtitles.english: there's an interesting flag

subtitles.original: 胸踊る巡り合いは
subtitles.english: An exciting encounter

subtitles.original: 舞一期舞一会
subtitles.english: Dancing once in a lifetime

subtitles.original: 全部優しさで包み込む
subtitles.english: Wrapping everything in kindness

subtitles.original: 上げろ上げて... (Agero Agete!)
subtitles.english: Raise it up, raise it up! (Agero Agete!)

subtitles.original: うつろい色あせるように... 秘密の奥...
subtitles.english: As it shifts and fades... deep within a secret...
X X X O O O ... 10 years old

subtitles.original: 儚いね笑って Enjoy
subtitles.english: It's fleeting, isn't it? Just smile and enjoy

subtitles.original: 踊ってみたサマー アルゴリズムの中
subtitles.english: I tried dancing this summer in the algorithm

subtitles.original: 三叉で旅して
subtitles.english: Traveling through the fork in the road

subtitles.original: 立ち上がるもの 解いた絆を
subtitles.english: Those who stand up, the bonds untied

subtitles.original: 決してしまわないこと... 壊しよ
subtitles.english: Don't ever let it end... destroy it

subtitles.original: この世界を変えていくよ
subtitles.english: I'm going to change this world

subtitles.original: きっと好きじゃないけど 君の中の世界なら変えられるはず
subtitles.english: I probably won't like it, but if it's the world inside you, it should be changeable

subtitles.original: 夏咲いてみて 実って枯れて 誰一人はぐれないから
subtitles.english: Bloom in summer, ripen and wither, because no one will be left behind

subtitles.original: 最後に君が笑ってくれれば もうそれだけでいい
subtitles.english: If you smile at the end, that's all I need
